Title: To the Cliffs
Description:
I sent Scout Brax forward along the road to the cliffs overlooking the beach to the west.

I am going to put you onto Bastia. Travel down the path and let Brax know that we are going to take a different route.

We'll see you at the attack on the Alliance beachhead!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Scout Brax on the path down the cliffs north of the Savage Glen on the Lost Isles.
RewardText:
Hello, little goblin. Bastia is fast, no?

We have something very important that needs doing. Can you help us?
